text: مُهۡطِعِينَ مُقۡنِعِي رُءُوسِهِمۡ لَا يَرۡتَدُّ إِلَيۡهِمۡ طَرۡفُهُمۡۖ وَأَفۡـِٔدَتُهُمۡ هَوَآءٞ

translation.en: Racing ahead, their heads raised up, their glance does not come back to them, and their hearts are void
translation.id: mereka datang tergesa-gesa (memenuhi panggilan) dengan mengangkat kepalanya, sedang mata mereka tidak berkedip dan hati mereka kosong
